title.value: Универсальные машины для возделывания картофеля и овощей на узкопрофильных гребнях с предварительным удалением камней
Multipurpose machine for cultivation potatoes and vegetables on slim line crests with preliminary removing of stones

person.name: Buyashov, V.P., Private Unitary enterprise 'TENS TRANS' (Russian Federation))
Gorbachev, I.V., Russian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Moscow (Russian Federation)
Svistun, A.V., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the article questions of use of universal cars at potato (Solanum tuberosum) and vegetables cultivation on narrow-purpose crests with preliminary removal of stones from a zone of an arrangement of crests the converted potato combine harvester of modular type are considered. Agricultural producers need both simple and cheap, and the wide-high modular units adapted to the conditions of the CIS. Both can be used effectively with modern tractors of 1.4 and 2 class. Universal modular four-row machine for preparation of soil littered with stones and intended to planting potatoes, sowing seeds of root crops and vegetables with minor alterations turns into a harvester that has a significant economic effect.
